revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nokia |model=G-240W |revision=-E |fcc_date=08/08/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=wireless router, fiber gateway, analog phone gateway, ONT |fcc_id=2ADZRG240WE |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model= |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF2G18AC-TI |ram1= |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLW1G, TE1813 P30, 203-11 3; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLW1G, TE1809 P30, 477-10 3; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=2.4GHz, 256QAM WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85319-11;85319-1, 1721 MX;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85729-11;SKY, 729, 2100E;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, DFS (master), GPON, 802.11k/v/r, TR-069, TR-111, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NOKIA-XXXX, NOKIA-XXXX-11ac |default_ip=192.168.18.1 |default_user=admin }} {{TagLine|Nokia WiFi Gateway 3}} :{{ProductPage|https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/nokia-wifi}}
"G-240W-E_MB Ver.C" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
"Nokia WiFi Gateway 3 (G-240W-E), GPON residential gateway ONT with 2 POTS ports, 4 GE UNI, 5G Wi-Fi, and 3x3 2.4G Wi-Fi. Includes two USB 2.0 Type A ports and a 12V US 2-pin plug, wall-mounted power supply variant with a barrel-type DC connector" - User Manual on the FCC :There is a spot for a fourth 2.4 GHz FEM but it is not populated in this device. The CPU ID is not legible in the FCC internal photos. A screenshot in the User Manual of the Device Information page of the configuration interface shows the Chipset as BCM6846 but appears to be from the [[Nokia HA-030W-B]] ([https://fccid.io/2ADZRHA030WB 2ADZRHA030WB]) which has a similar design but a different CPU.
==Images== <gallery caption="Internal"> Image:2ADZRG240WE_MainBoard.jpg|board top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
